title: mouse and keyboard ingame problem
body:
its started recently , like 1 or 2 time per game , my character stop moving , i cant right click to move and the left click only ping also no key on keyboard work , this last around 1 to 10 sec ( enough to lose a fight )
im using a razer naga epic chroma mouse and blackwidow keyboard ( the keyboard is new and the issue started 1 or 2 week after i got it)

any ideal what can be the problem ?????
thank

replies.body: nha im not , but so far its been 3 day with no problem since i turn the usb power saving off

nvm just had a lucky night , still doing it

currently trying with usb power saving off  ,  will update if its work
are you using a mac? If so turn off your hot corners.

well not sure what worked , but for now i been playing all night with no problem .

i soap washed my mouse pad
and cleaned all my mouse with connector cleaner

still had the problem this morning


than i followed the connection guide packet loss , everything was pretty much green except a few yellow (did not understand what i was looking at haha)
and i ran the hextech repair tool

all night without a problem so far

im a happy guy now

It seems this could be an issue caused by some pretty nasty bursts of *Packet Loss*, which occurs when there are some big issues between your PC and our servers. I strongly recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) so as to ensure your local network settings are 100% compatible with League.

Please let me know if this caused any changes for you.
